vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Isa.7.14;
son of: Joseph (G2501) and Mary (G3137);
brother of: James (G2385I), Joseph (G2500), Simon (G4613H) and Jude (G2455I)
Also named: Emmanouēl<\i> (Ἐμμανουήλ "Immanuel" G1694)
§ Immanuel = "God with us" or "with us is God"
symbolic and prophetic name of the Messiah, the Christ, prophesying that He would be born of a virgin and would be 'God with us'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hombre; su nacimiento predicho por el profeta Isaías; "Dios con nosotros"
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以馬內利 这个
陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神同在" 或"上帝與我們在一起"
耶穌是彌賽亞的記號及預言,預言中說有一童女將生下耶穌,表示著神與我們同在
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以马内利 这个
阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "神同在" 或"上帝与我们在一起"
耶稣是弥赛亚的记号及预言,预言中说有一童女将生下耶稣,表示着神与我们同在
